attributes.action: Give all stillborn babies born during the second trimester the same stillbirth rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the law stands now all stillborn babies born before 24 weeks gestation do not have any birth rights. They are not even recognized as being stillborn. As a recently bereaved mother to a baby boy born at 23 weeks and 4 days gestation I feel this is very wrong. I feel all babies and their parents should have the right to have their babys birth recognized by law. So they have the same birth rights as babies born as babies born after 24 weeks gestation.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give all stillborn babies born during the second trimester the same stillbirth rights."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17265


Prime Minister's Office
